name: Do Not Miss
description:
This application was created by a person who is fond of games for those who love games.

Feel like a real biathlete - every shot is important. The one wins who is the fastest and the most accurate.

This is a game which is easy to start, but difficult to master.

There are ten different rifles with three basic characteristics.

There are sixteen different types of competitions. Start with the easiest ones and then take part in longtime marathons.

Challenge all the world in the global score top.

Feel the tension of the battle in multiplayer hot-seat mode. Up to four people can play using one device.
